archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0138
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to record customers who have verified their identity as a result of a credit check, so that if we need to help them in the future, we know who they are

properties.value: It's not about storing the identity details, but just store the information that a customer was verified in the past. Later different actions might be taken based on this. Rules for credit check/fraud for additional session

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
